If **shot size or spatial position** changes, describe how these transitions occur clearly, specifying both the **initial and final states**.

In addition, the human-written captions below already describe the subjects (if any) and the scenery in this video but do not capture their spatial composition and movements. A tree stump is prominently visible in the middle ground, with the trunks of larger trees in the soft-focus background.**

Please note that the video features **salient human subjects**, so you should focus on describing the spatial framing and movements of them.
